name: Cloud Technology Solutions Ltd
overview:
Cloud Technology Solutions, one of the faster growning cloud companies in Europe is a Google Apps Premier Partner, works with enterprises, educational institutions and government agencies to help them innovate and collaborate in the Google Apps cloud.

Since 2008, the company has transitioned over 500,000 people from legacy, on-premise systems into the cloud with messaging, collaboration, and custom development for the web and mobile devices.

As a leading Global Cloud Service Provider, Cloud Technology Solutions are trusted by many of the worldâ€™s most well known organisations to help them move their businesses define a cloud ready strategy, deploy and implement cloud solutions, integrate those solutions with legacy systems and other clouds, and provide ongoing education and support for the new cloud eco-systems.

Cloud Technology Solutions are renown world-wide as the Google Apps Migration experts, but migration is just the beginning of your evoluation to the Google Apps cloud. Cloud Technology Solutions delivers a complete range of services to help your organization to take full advantage of the Google Apps cloud environment.
